sentences.sentence: It never obeys barrettes or bands.
sentences.translation: 它从来不听发夹和发带的话。

sentences.sentence: And me, my hair is lazy. It never obeys barrettes or hands.
sentences.translation: 我的呢，我的头发比较懒惰，它从来不听发夹或手的话。

sentences.sentence: We put some barrettes in his very short hair and took the traditional first-day-of-school pictures.
sentences.translation: 我们给他的短发上别上了几个发夹，拍了传统的“第一天入学照”。
